resources.string: It looks like there is no internet connection. Please try again later.

This part of the application is only accessible via the web interface. Want to be redirected to the website?
You need to log in to use this function.
Get more trustworthy verified profile right now
Write your nick, current date, name amateri.com on the paper and take a photo with it. If you are using the profile as a pair, we need a verification photo from you both.
New picture has beed sent. Verification photo will be checked by administrator. Thank you.
You can Top the ad to the 1st place right now.
Using the Top feature makes the dating ad more visible and it will maintain a top position in its category for %d days.
Repeated use of the Top feature adds up the days, dating ads with more cumulated days will gain higher position in the list.
The price of one single message received is %s including VAT.
Thank you for helping us to develop this app. We’d love to receive your feedback, please click the link in the left menu.
We are sorry, but only VIP members can use this feature for free.

Do you want discounted plan or one-time payment?
The advantage of a recurring VIP membership is that you do not have to create and confirm every single payment. You will receive a renewal confirmation each time a new period starts.
